hero.headline: Over a Century of Brotherhood in Nogales
hero.subhead: Serving the Citizens of Nogales, Arizona since 1892.

legacy.tagline: Serving the Citizens of Nogales, Arizona since 1892.
bullets: Members from diverse backgrounds, faiths, and ages.

community.title: Nogales & Our Community
community.body: Nogales takes its name from the Spanish word for walnut tree—nogal—recalling the groves that once shaded the mountain pass. Incorporated as a city in 1893, it stands at the historic border with Nogales, Sonora, a gateway for commerce and culture. With hundreds of historic properties, Nogales reflects a deep, shared heritage we’re proud to serve.

visitUs.title: Visiting & Traveling Brothers
visitUs.text: We welcome traveling Masons. Present your current dues card and make yourself at home—contact the Secretary in advance when possible.

ctaBanner.title: Be part of our legacy. Join or Visit today.
